alert.note: Alert for Central St. Louis; North Cass; North Itasca; North St. Louis; Northern Aitkin; South Itasca (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 28 at 9:29PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Itasca, northwestern Aitkin, east central Cass and west central St. Louis Counties through 1000 PM CDT... At 929 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Togo, to Coleraine, to 6 miles northwest of Outing, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Meadow Brook and Togo around 935 PM CDT. Taconite around 940 PM CDT. Pengilly around 945 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Gheen, Keewatin, Nashwauk, Hill City, Cook, Lake Vermilion and Chisholm. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle. These storms may intensify. Monitor local NOAA Weather Radio, commercial radio, or television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CDT for north central, northeastern and east central Minnesota.

area.areaDesc: Central St. Louis; North Cass; North Itasca; North St. Louis; Northern Aitkin; South Itasca
